creator: dev@tomcat.apache.org
text:
When POSTing a large amount of data to a JSP (we're testing with about 10k) to Tomcat via Apache 1.3.12 with mod_jk, I get an "ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 8186".

This doesn't happen when calling Tomcat directly. I haven't checked mod_jserv

Here's the stack trace, edited slightly for brevity.
